page.title: 06OFFSHORE OIL WORKER'S FAMILY
page.content: My dad works offshore now and again but not very often.When he is not offshore he works for a company called Colos.He has to repair trawlers in the harbour or big machinery in factories. He is never really bothered about going offshore unless he is going away for a few months. when he returns he is normally underweight from not eating the food on the rig. When he is not away he has got me helping service his motorbike or my mums car.When he is away my brother is the head of the house but all he everdoes is sit on his backside and watch T.V! so half the time I take charge! Once when my dad was away i went to a disco,I told my mum I would be back at eleven but I did'nt get back until
